TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GetManifestCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

summary.span: Fornece dados para o evento de .

span.span: Provides data for the event of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use para obter informações sobre um [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] após tem sido baixados os manifestos de aplicativo e implantação de aplicativo.Use to obtain information about a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application after the deployment and application manifests have been downloaded. ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como usar para instalar um [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] aplicativo programaticamente em um computador cliente.The following code example shows how to use to install a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application programmatically on a client machine. [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: Obtém o contexto do aplicativo [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] atual.

summary.span: Obtém o manifesto do aplicativo [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] para essa implantação.

span.span: Gets the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application manifest for this deployment.

value.span: Um que representa o manifesto do aplicativo.

span.span: An representing the application manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Você pode usar essa variável para capturar informações que você precisa do manifesto de aplicativo, como uma lista de dependências, informações de confiança e assim por diante.You can use this variable to grab any information you need from the application manifest, such as a list of dependencies, trust information, and so on. Para obter mais informações sobre a estrutura deste documento, consulte [manifesto do aplicativo ClickOnce](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29570cec-4e53-4660-a850-abc4fa150243).For more information on the structure of this document, see [ClickOnce Application Manifest](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29570cec-4e53-4660-a850-abc4fa150243). ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como examinar um manifesto de aplicativo de dentro um manipulador de eventos para determinar se o aplicativo requer confiança total por padrão.The following code example shows how to examine an application manifest from within a event handler to determine whether the application requires full trust by default. [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#5)]
